query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_posts, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN content LIKE '%This is a placeholder for the full blog post content%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as placeholder_posts,
       SUM(CASE WHEN content NOT LIKE '%This is a placeholder for the full blog post content%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as real_content_posts
FROM blog_posts WHERE published = 1;

       SUM(CASE WHEN content NOT LIKE '%This is a placeholder for the full blog post content%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as real_content_posts
FROM blog_posts WHERE published = 1;
